divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside my house at around 8:30 am to smoke a cigarette. I was standing in my front driveway leaning on the back of my car and I leaned my head back to enjoy the morning sky when I saw a silver circular object going through the sky pretty fast. I first thought it would have had to be a helicopter based on the shape. I don't know heights that well but it would've been closer to a airplanes height in the sky then a helicopter. I looked at it for about 10 seconds and specifically looked for wings because I was like there is no way I'm seeing a real UFO right now, but I couldn't see wings on it and I couldn't see the rotors or a tail. It appeared to be spherical from the angle I was seeing it at. It was a shiny silver chrome color. It maintained a straight flight path. I was very surprised by it and pretty uneasy just for the fact that it was there. I know a lot about UFO's but I was still very surprised to see one. I quickly ran inside and showed my brother from his upstairs balcony but by now it was almost a dot and he saw it but couldn't make out any details.
Summary: Silver circular object higher than a helicopter heading towards mountains
